name: Venn
description:
Venn is an experimental game made for a class dealing with new types of digital storytelling.

Why is the game called Venn?

  • There are 3 normal, linear stories.The characters never visually or physically collide in game.Those are the 3 seperate circles.When a character's story is echoed or adapted in another story, that's an overlap.The entire overlap does not exist visually or physically in game,It's when the player puts the stories and encounters together to understand the narrative as a whole.
